column1: '''''Tolkien Journal'' (Vol.3, No.4)''' is an issue of the ''[[Tolkien Journal]]''.
The article "A Ready Answer" by [[Bonniejean Christensen
column2: Bonniejean McGuire Christensen]] (a review of ''[[The Tolkien Relation]]'') includes extracts from a letter by [[J.R.R. Tolkien
column3: Tolkien]] (p. 15) to the [[Tolkien Society of America]].<ref>[http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=55280 Tolkien Journal. November 1969] at [http://www.tolkienbooks.net Tolkienbooks.net] (accessed 27 October 2011)</ref>
